question: Which company has launched a new ventilation device named 'SpiceOxy'?
explanation:
Gurgaon-based Indian airline SpiceJet has recently launched a compact, portable ventilation device named 'SpiceOxy'.
The handy and affordable device can be used for patients with mild to moderate breathing issues. SpiceJet has also introduced a fingertip pulse oximeter, which can be used to measure the oxygen level of the blood.
